alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 06 at 7:57PM EDT until June 07 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Pockets of minor coastal flooding and splash-over around the time of high tide late tonight. * WHERE...Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/02 AM 10.6 1.8 0.8 2-3 None 07/03 PM 9.4 0.6 1.1 2 None 08/03 AM 10.7 1.9 1.0 1-2 None 08/04 PM 9.4 0.6 1.1 1 None 09/04 AM 10.4 1.6 1.0 1 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/02 AM 11.2 1.7 1.2 3 Minor 07/03 PM 9.9 0.4 1.4 2 None 08/03 AM 11.2 1.7 1.3 1-2 Minor 08/04 PM 9.9 0.4 1.4 1 None 09/04 AM 10.9 1.4 1.3 1 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
